problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): The college counselor was giving advice to Betty and Paul. Betty is very good at the sciences and wants to major in Math. Paul, on the other hand, had a terrible time in math class this semester and wants to switch majors from computer science to painting.
Question: Who wants to major in STEM?
ans0: Paul
ans1: Can't be determined
ans2: Betty
